ygData.subject: Re: Chords of Dissonance
ygData.msgSnippet: it only does damage to other players in a PvP zone or on the PvP server. and it does go up as you level.  the best way to find out is to duel a friend and have
ygData.messageBody:
it only does damage to other players in a PvP zone or on the PvP server.
and it does go up as you level. the best way to find out is to duel a
friend and have him check his health as you play it on him.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 45 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: G2 Dan [mailto:drockwell@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 3:15 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Chords of Dissonance
>
>
> From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
>
>
> Supposedly this spell gets more power as you advance, does
> anyone know to
> what extent? Initally in the lower levels 1-6 I found this
> spell to be a
> great way to kill myself, either in attracting that ever
> popular guard you
> forgot patrolled your area of the incredible "there he is
> that guy, everyone
> get him!" attraction feature of this song. But lately at 9th
> I've had alot
> of fun practicing my String skill and nuking lvl 1 characters
> in the newbie
> areas of freeport. But I'm curious just how much damage does
> this song
> actually do anyways? I've been using it more and more in the
> desert taking
> spiders and such. Makes for a great helper if you think
> you're not gonna
> make it out alive. Sure you have to be sure nothing else is around
> otherwise you'll be double/tripple teamed by creatures but
> even still I
> finally feel like its a useful spell. Also in a party does
> this spell also
> do damage to members in your party as well?
>
> Gediprime, of Xegony
>
>
